Subsection.Text: A completed certificate of birth shall be filed with the local registrar within 5 days of each birth in accordance with chapter 382.
Each maternal death, newborn death, and stillbirth shall be reported immediately to the medical examiner.
The licensee shall comply with all requirements of this chapter and rules promulgated hereunder.
A report shall be submitted annually to the agency. The contents of the report shall be prescribed by rule of the agency.
